entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump We need a #coronavirus crimes commission to investigate public officials who have willfully ignored government and medical directives and, as a result, are responsible for deaths and therefore guilty of #NegligentHomicide. 

#COVID19 #covidcriminals #Trump #Desantis #LockThemUp
